timeline.bodyText: What's your operating system? It was required to pass in "--vm-driver=xhyve" parameter on my Mac OS laptop. Probably, we need to mention that this parameter has to be added on that operating system.
timeline.author: dmagda
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,7 +22,7 @@ Once this is done, make sure that Minikube sees Docker images registered locally
     eval $(minikube docker-env)
 
 Start Minikube:
-    minikube start --vm-driver=xhyve
+    minikube start

replies.bodyText: I use MacOS too, default provider works fine
replies.author: timoninmaxim
